Structure# AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
struct AccessibilityAttributes
```

## [Topics](/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes#Instance-Properties)

[`let accessibilityHeadingLevel: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.HeadingLevelAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityheadinglevel)[`let accessibilitySpeechAdjustedPitch: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.AdjustedPitchAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechadjustedpitch)[`let accessibilitySpeechAnnouncementPriority: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.AnnouncementPriorityAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechannouncementpriority)[`let accessibilitySpeechAnnouncementsQueued: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.QueueAnnouncementAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechannouncementsqueued)Deprecated[`let accessibilitySpeechIncludesPunctuation: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.IncludesPunctuationAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechincludespunctuation)[`let accessibilitySpeechPhoneticNotation: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.IPANotationAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechphoneticnotation)[`let accessibilitySpeechSpellsOutCharacters: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.SpellOutAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilityspeechspellsoutcharacters)[`let accessibilityTextCustom: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.TextCustomAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilitytextcustom)[`let accessibilityTextualContext: AttributeScopes.AccessibilityAttributes.TextualContextAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/accessibilitytextualcontext)### [Enumerations](/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes#Enumerations)

[`enum AdjustedPitchAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/adjustedpitchattribute)An attribute to adjust the pitch the spoken speech.[`enum AnnouncementPriorityAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/announcementpriorityattribute)An attribute to define the urgency of the announcement.[`enum HeadingLevelAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/headinglevelattribute)An attribute for the level of this heading.[`enum IPANotationAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/ipanotationattribute)An attribute to define the International Phonetic Alphabet representation for speech.[`enum IncludesPunctuationAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/includespunctuationattribute)An attribute to define how punctuation should be spoken.[`enum QueueAnnouncementAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/queueannouncementattribute)An attribute to define if speech announcements spoken by VoiceOver should be queued behind existing speech rather than interrupting speech in progress.Deprecated[`enum SpellOutAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/spelloutattribute)An attribute to define if each character should be spoken separately.[`enum TextCustomAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/textcustomattribute)An attribute for custom, localized text attributes.[`enum TextualContextAttribute`](/documentation/foundation/attributescopes/accessibilityattributes/textualcontextattribute)An attribute for the textual context.## [Relationships](/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/AccessibilityAttributes#relationships)
